text:
Hi guys today I'm going to show you how
to prepare mussels before cooking
because you want to have them alive, clean, and undamaged
you add some salt to some cold water, and you add the mussels

so after 20 minutes the mussels which come to the
surface, you take them off, you get rid of them because they are dead
now you take the mussels out of the water
now you want to be sure that all mussels are closed
if you find an open mussel, like this, you tap on it and if it doesn't move- it's dead
so the next step is, you want to get rid of broken mussels
so in many stores they sell already mussels which are de-bearded, but if the beard's still on you need to get rid of this too
so you hold the beard inbetween the knife and my thumb then I pull it towards the end
so then use a scrubbing cloth to get rid of the remains
good luck and enjoy your mussels
and for more tips, click the link below
